alert.note: Alert for Branch; Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 18 at 5:10AM EDT until March 19 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Localized amounts up to 4 inches are possible, particularly in northern portions of Berrien, Cass, and St. Joseph counties. * WHERE...Cass MI, St. Joseph MI, Branch, Northern Berrien and Southern Berrien Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 5 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds will gust to 25 to 35 mph at times, and may cause minor blowing and drifting where accumulations can occur. Wind chills will be in the single digits above zero through Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Branch; Cass; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph
